lines.text: A simple, sturdy fishing rod. It looks like it’s lived quite a life, with scratches all over. Or maybe its owner just didn’t take very good care of it.

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Come to think of it, there’s water all around here, isn’t there? I wonder if this can be used here...
Right as I glance out the window to confirm that thought, a small wave crashes against it, scattering droplets of water into the room. Instinctively, I jump back to avoid it.

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Eep, it still got on me...

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Okay, yes, water is very much present. Point taken.
I tiptoe around the glass on the ground and make my way to the window.
Looking down, I watch the golden waves lap rhythmically against white walls.
Sea foam blooms with every step of its dance, bursting into the air before streaming away.
It’s mesmerizing, and I follow its rise and fall for a while before finally noticing movement in the water’s depths.

lines.name: p???
lines.text: But I don’t recognize what type they are...

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Not sure why I expect to, though.

lines.name: p???
lines.text: I mean, this fishing rod is probably mine. What if I’m actually an expert fisherman?

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Or maybe I’m one of those kinds of people who just have the props but don’t follow through with the lifestyle?

lines.name: p???
lines.text: Well, in any case, let’s take this along. Looks like I’ll be able to use it outside.
